memberdef.definition: typedef void(* mchp_xec_ecia_callback_t) (int girq_id, int src, void *user)
memberdef.name: mchp_xec_ecia_callback_t

briefdescription.para: Driver for External interrupt controller in Microchip XEC devices.

detaileddescription.para: Based on reference manuals: Reference Manuals for MEC152x and MEC172x ARM(r) 32-bit MCUs
enable GIRQn interrupt for specific source

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the interrupt source in the GIRQ (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: enable EXTI interrupt for specific line specified by parameter encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA macro.

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA

briefdescription.para: disable EXTI interrupt for specific line

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the interrupt source in the GIRQ (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: disable EXTI interrupt for specific line specified by parameter encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA macro.

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA

memberdef.argsstring: (int girq_id, int src, mchp_xec_ecia_callback_t cb, void *data)
memberdef.name: mchp_xec_ecia_set_callback

briefdescription.para: set GIRQn interrupt source callback

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the interrupt source in the GIRQ (0 - 31)
user callback
user data

briefdescription.para: set GIRQn interrupt source callback

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA
user callback
user data

memberdef.argsstring: (const struct device *dev_girq, int src, mchp_xec_ecia_callback_t cb, void *data)
memberdef.name: mchp_xec_ecia_set_callback_by_dev

briefdescription.para: set GIRQn interrupt source callback

parameterdescription.para: is a handle to the GIRQn device
is the interrupt source in the GIRQ (0 - 31)
user callback
user data

briefdescription.para: unset GIRQn interrupt source callback

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the interrupt source in the GIRQ (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: unset GIRQn interrupt source callback

parameterdescription.para: is a handle to the GIRQn device
is the interrupt source in the GIRQ (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: enable or disable aggregated GIRQ output

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
non-zero enables aggregated output else disables

briefdescription.para: clear GIRQ latched source status bit

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the source bit position in the GIRQ registers (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: enable a source in a GIRQ

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the source bit position in the GIRQ registers (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: disable a source in a GIRQ

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
is the source bit position in the GIRQ registers (0 - 31)

briefdescription.para: clear GIRQ latches sources specified in bitmap

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
contains the source bits to clear

briefdescription.para: enable sources in a GIRQ

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
contains the source bits to enable

briefdescription.para: disable sources in a GIRQ

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)
contains the source bits to disable

briefdescription.para: Read GIRQ result register (bit-wise OR of enable and source)

parameterdescription.para: is the GIRQ number (8 - 26)

briefdescription.para: Clear external NVIC input pending status.

parameterdescription.para: is 0 to maximum NVIC inputs for the chip.

briefdescription.para: enable or disable aggregated GIRQ output

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA
is flag to indicate enable(1) or disable(0)

briefdescription.para: clear GIRQ latched source status bit

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA

briefdescription.para: enable a source in a GIRQ

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA

briefdescription.para: disable a source in a GIRQ

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA

briefdescription.para: Read GIRQ result register (bit-wise OR of enable and source)

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA

briefdescription.para: Clear external NVIC input pending status given encoded ECIA info.

parameterdescription.para: is GIRQ connection encoded with MCHP_XEC_ECIA
